resources.string:
"Start by opening Settings in the menu.
Choose 'Mqtt broker IP' and fill in the IP-address of your Mqtt broker.
Next, click Buttons. Here you can set the label, topic and codes for each button. When a button is clicked, a Mqtt message are sent to the specified Mqtt broker.The message has the button's topic and the code is the payload.
If you dont set a label for a button it won't be activated."
